item.title: How to reuse steps in Tekton tasks with kustomize
item.description: Creating Tekton tasks is real fun! Its similarities to pod containers, and how it works make developing and testing super easy. Still, sometimes it is necessary to reuse steps in multiple tasks, like when using reviewdog. In this post, we will learn how to do this very easily using kustomize, and the repo danielfbm/tekton-tasks-kustomize has a ready-to-use example.
